My biggest worry was Yukari.%K%P
I knew what Shion and Kaede were up to, but no\none had any idea what Yukari was planning.%K%P
\dWhere did Yukari go...?\d%K%P
\dOh, but I'm right here!\d%K%P
\dBwaah?!\d%K%P
How did she get right behind me?!%K%P
I hadn't even noticed her.%K%P
\dEhehe, did I surprise you?\d%K%P
\dDon't go sneaking up on me like that...\d%K%P
\dSorry. But the two of us need to be together at\nall times, you know.\d%K%P
It was true that she and I had to be close by to \nprevent her Tatari from running amok.%K%P
But it wasn't like we were always together.%K%P
\dWere you looking for me?\d%K%P
\dYeah...\d%K%P
She had that same smile she always had.%K%P
It was impossible to read what was underneath.%K%P
\dHoping for a partner in bed, was it?\d%K%P
\dNope, definitely not that.\d%K%P
\dOh, no need to play coy. Just say the word and\nI'll be ready for you.\d%K%P
Sounds like you're the one asking for it.%K%P
\dYes yes, enough with the jokes.\d%K%P
\dI'm well aware that you have been worried about\nme.\d%K%P
\dI'm sorry that I couldn't be straight with you.\d%K%P
\dIt's fine. You've got plans of your own, right?\d%K%P
\dI do. More importantly, I don't need to hide them\nanymore.\d%K%P
\dI can finally tell you.\d%K%P
\dEhehe!\d%K%P
\dHeading out at a time like this, it's like we're\non a secret date, huh?\d%K%P
She held my hand in hers, and looked to be\nthoroughly enjoying this.%K%P
\dWhere exactly are you taking me?\d%K%P
\dWe never know who could be listening back there.\nWe need to head somewhere a little more private.\d%K%P
This was just like her.%K%P
Sometimes too bold, other times too secretive. She\nwas a hard Goddess to put a label on.%K%P
\dDon't worry. I won't lay a single finger on you.\d%K%P
\dThough by all means, if you wish to lay a finger\non me, feel free!\d%K%P
\dOkay, here we are!\d%K%P
Yukari had led me out to the Shiraito Falls.%K%P
The lights would normally be out but, maybe for\nsafety reasons, they were still lit.%K%P
\dI've never been out here at night. So this is what\nit's like...\d%K%P
\dIt's going to be all lit up for the festival,\napparently.\d%K%P
\dIt said so on the site Shion made.\d%K%P
That was the first I had heard of it...%K%P
\dThe falls and the red leaves should make for quite\nthe sight.\d%K%P
\dShion's hoping to win votes by getting people to\nstick around here until late.\d%K%P
\dShe told you that...?\d%K%P
\dNo, but it's pretty obvious, really.\d%K%P
She acted like she never paid attention to anything\nbut me, but I guess Yukari was more observant than\nI gave her credit for.%K%P
I wondered if the other two had caught on to this\nside of her.%K%P
\dI know how Shion is just using Kaede.\d%K%P
\dAnd that Kaede is well aware of it...\d%K%P
\dOh yes, I've seen through it all!\d%K%P
\dW-Well then...\d%K%P
I hadn't expected that of Kaede.%K%P
She never let on as much, but I could imagine it\nbeing true.%K%P
\dSo... Knowing all that, what are you gonna do?\d%K%P
\dEhehehe!\d%K%P
\dI came all the way out here and you're still not\ngoing to tell me?\d%K%P
Wasn't that the reason we had come here?%K%P
\dYou're wrong about just one thing.\d%K%P
\dIf you want to win, you need a plan, you think.\nWell, says who?\d%K%P
\dWho needs a plan? Of course I have ideas to help\nmake more things fun, but...\d%K%P
\dI'm Yukari Amatsu. And though I may be a\nTatarigami, I am still a Goddess.\d%K%P
\dI am here as my true self. With no intention to\nhide anything.\d%K%P
\dI will present myself to the people as I am, as\nyour wife... Nothing more, nothing less...\d%K%P
She moved to stand right in front of me.%K%P
She was close enough to touch, and peered up at\nme.%K%P
\dYukari...?\d%K%P
\dI yearn for you, Akira... My true love...\d%K%P
Her arms wrapped around me.%K%P
Not too strong, just in a soft embrace.%K%P
\dI don't care what happens in the contest.\d%K%P
\dAll I want is your love...\d%K%P
\dI don't care if no one agrees with it. I just love\nyou. That's it.\d%K%P
She began to speak more strongly.%K%P
And her arms drew in tighter.%K%P
\dI won't give you to anyone. I will not... I will\nNOT...\d%K%P
\dYou are mine and only mine... Hehehehe!\d%K%P
\dThe other two are so focused on this competition\nthat they've lost sight of what's most important.\d%K%P
\dAll that matters is who you love the most. And who\nloves you the most.\d%K%P
\dThat's what's most important...\d%K%P
\dAnd the one who thinks of you, yearns for you,\nrespects you, adores you...and loves you...is me,\nand me alone...\d%K%P
\dOnly someone who thinks of you as much as I do\ncan be worthy of your love.\d%K%P
\dI, Yukari Amatsu, am your number one.\d%K%P
\dRight? Don't you think so too?\d%K%P
She was squeezing me as hard as she could.%K%P
I flinched a little from the pain.%K%P
\dDoes it hurt? Is it too much to bear?\d%K%P
\dThat's just how I feel. The pain, the longing,\nit's unbearable.\d%K%P
\dOh, if only you could understand my feelings...!\d%K%P
\dBut no. It's fine. No one will ever understand my\nlove.\d%K%P
\dThat's my fate as a Tatarigami...\d%K%P
She had gone nearly insane.%K%P
If she had gone a step further, I might have had to\nshake her off.%K%P
\dThis was hard on you too, huh...\d%K%P
Yukari thought the others had lost sight of\nreality.%K%P
And maybe I had too.%K%P
\dI'm sorry Yukari. I had you pegged all wrong.\d%K%P
I hugged her back as I spoke.%K%P
\dA-Akira?\d%K%P
\dSomehow I convinced myself that you were happy. I\nfigured it would be enough that you didn't have to\nworry about your Tatari day-to-day.\d%K%P
\dBut I was fooling myself, huh? Your initial\ndesires were still unanswered. Nothing has\nchanged.\d%K%P
I had just gone and assumed she was happy enough\nbeing with me.%K%P
But she wasn't, was she?%K%P
She hadn't been saved yet.%K%P
\dBut... You don't have to hug me like this...\d%K%P
\dDon't be so hard on yourself.\d%K%P
\dIt's not like you, right? Plus, I'm hugging you\nbecause I want to.\d%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
The tension slowly drained from Yukari's body.%K%P
The death-grip she had on me faded, and her arms\nlaid wrapped around me.%K%P
\dAkira... Oh Akira Akira Akira!\d%K%P
\dI'm sorry I never noticed this side of you.\d%K%P
\dIt's fine, don't apologize! You didn't do\nanything.\d%K%P
\dYou really are something special... Not just\nbecause you can control my Tatari, but something\nmore...\d%K%P
\dI was right about us being meant for each other.\d%K%P
\dOh Akira... I love you... I really do...\d%K%P
\dI know, so don't cry. It ruins that pretty face.\d%K%P
\dBut...but...!\d%K%P
\dCome on, enough now.\d%K%P
I drew her to my chest to hide her crying face.%K%P
Seeing her that way, she looked like any normal\ngirl.%K%P
Maybe she was a Tatarigami with unimaginable \npowers, but she was also a young woman with a lot\non her mind.%K%P
That was the side of her I found lovely.%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
She continued crying into my arms.%K%P
The crying girl here was the real Yukari.%K%P
I couldn't forget that.%K%P
The memory of that night etched itself deep into my\nheart.%K%P
